values.text:
FREE HOME WATER

EFFICIENCY CHECK
Join in and lower your bills
Enquire now

Last time you visited the Savings Engine, we had a free home visit service available for you from SOS Water, in partnership with SOS Home Services. This free service is stilt available and includes free water saving items. See below to find out more and to get started simply just tog back in to your Savings Engine to submit an enquiry.
Arrange my visit
FREE HOME VISIT
At a time to suit you!
A free home water efficiency check means a qualified Water Safe technician from SE Home Services will visit your home to fit free water savings devices and see how you can save on water ant energy,
Let's Start
CHECK
Current fittings & Flow rates

FIT FREE
Water saving Device
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.
Show More
CHECK & FIXED
Simple leaks to toilets and taps
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit,
To book your free home visit, log back in to the Savings Engine to submit an enquiry, or call 0330 333 9801
